description.en: Used to add a new point or expand on the previous idea
description.vi: Dùng để thêm một luận điểm mới hoặc mở rộng ý vừa nêu

advanced.example: Furthermore, the data reveals a significant increase.
Moreover, this trend is expected to continue.
Additionally, there are environmental concerns.
In addition to this, the costs have risen.
Japan saw growth. Likewise, Korea experienced expansion.
Similarly, the urban population increased.

description.en: Used for comparing differences or presenting opposing ideas
description.vi: Dùng để so sánh sự khác biệt hoặc phản biện

advanced.example: Conversely, rural areas saw a decline.
In stark contrast, the second group showed no improvement.
On the contrary, the evidence suggests otherwise.
Nevertheless, the project was completed on time.
Notwithstanding these challenges, progress was made.
Men preferred sports, whereas women chose reading.
While A increased, B remained stable.

description.en: Used to show cause and effect relationships
description.vi: Dùng để chỉ mối quan hệ nhân quả

advanced.usage: As a result of what was mentioned
advanced.example: Consequently, many businesses closed down.
As a result, unemployment rates increased.
Hence, new policies were implemented.
Thus, the hypothesis was proven correct.
Therefore, immediate action is required.
Prices rose, thereby reducing demand.

description.en: Used to provide examples to support your point
description.vi: Dùng để đưa ví dụ minh họa cho luận điểm

advanced.example: For instance, China's economy grew by 8%.
To illustrate, consider the case of Japan.

advanced.word: A prime example of this is
advanced.example: A prime example of this is the 2008 financial crisis.
Developed countries, such as the UK and Germany, ...
Three factors were identified, namely cost, time, and quality.
Asian markets, in particular China, showed growth.

description.en: Used to show order of events or steps (especially for Process diagrams)
description.vi: Dùng để chỉ thứ tự các bước (đặc biệt quan trọng cho dạng bài Process)

advanced.example: Initially, the raw materials are collected.
Subsequently, the mixture is heated.
Following this, the product is packaged.
The next step involves quality testing.
Prior to this, the ingredients are mixed.
The process commences with the extraction of raw materials.
The cycle culminates in the distribution of finished goods.

description.en: Used to explain or rephrase a complex idea
description.vi: Dùng để làm rõ một ý tưởng trừu tượng hoặc phức tạp

advanced.example: That is to say, the impact was minimal.
In other words, demand exceeded supply.
To put it another way, costs outweighed benefits.
Specifically, the policy affected urban areas.

description.en: Used to highlight important data or arguments
description.vi: Dùng để làm nổi bật dữ liệu quan trọng trong Task 1 hoặc luận điểm trong Task 2

advanced.example: Particularly noteworthy is the rise in exports.
Notably, the youngest group showed the highest growth.
In particular, renewable energy saw significant investment.
Significantly, this was the first recorded decline.
It is worth noting that the trend reversed in 2015.

description.en: Used to acknowledge opposing views before presenting your argument
description.vi: Dùng để thừa nhận quan điểm đối lập trước khi đưa ra lập luận của mình

advanced.example: While it is true that costs are high, the benefits outweigh them.
Admittedly, there are some drawbacks to this approach.
Despite the challenges, progress was made.
Notwithstanding these concerns, the policy was implemented.
Granted that resources are limited, efficiency must improve.
